html:
9.29.24  7:25 pm   ive done classical piano lessons my entire life, up until a month ago when I finally got the courage to quit. (I found it to be toxic and although I am quite good I grew to hate the tedious practicing) In the last month ive discovered a passion for creating music. It's always been there, but now is not blocked by stress for the need to practice classical. i hear all these jazz and funky music ideas in my head. but when i go to play them my muscle memory in my hands just reverts to a classical style. I feel like I know too much theory and practiced so much in this specific style i can't actually play whats in my head. can you please help or offer advice? 

      i've never been in your situation with that kind of background. but i think that muscle memory is getting in your way because it has no connection to the sound. so you're probably gonna need to completely start over. make it totally different. my first idea here is to start off just trying to play with 1 finger. maybe even just the back of your finger

9.29.24  7:11 pm   which do you prefer, slide whistle or otamatone?

      i'm not interested in either. i think i am turned off by how overhyped they are

9.29.24  7:05 pm   Why can't I focus on my grad school applications?

      maybe you don't like them

9.29.24  6:07 pm   How many jokes do you think there are?

      just 1

9.29.24  5:46 pm   i am gonna try hard again this week

      ok

9.29.24  5:20 pm   Does the name James imply the existence of a singular Jame

      not really

9.29.24  5:14 pm   today i bought a big loaf of bread and i've already eaten about half of it so   i imagine i can eat the other half tomorrow? 

      that could work. sounds like a lot, but i don't know how big the loaf was

9.29.24  4:11 pm   what are your thoughts on thoughts

      that's probably over doing it. how about doing some feelings

9.29.24  3:53 pm   what inspired your play featuring an iphone power block and a mechanical pencil?

      i think i really wanted to do some dialogue

9.29.24  3:20 pm   did you use a tool to pick the colors on this site or did you just wing it

      i used my eyes, does that count

9.29.24  3:06 pm   in your priority list, is improving your dancing skills more important than improvising your dancing skills?

      i'm not sure those things are mutually exclusive

9.29.24  2:31 pm   Have you seen fight club the movie?

     no

     What are your thoughts on it?

     i don't like to watch people physically fighting. i'm pretty sure that movie has that in it

9.29.24  11:12 am   In what situations do you think it's appropriate to use randomness? And what kinds of randomizers do you use?

      when any direction seems equally fruitful, you can randomize to determine which way to go. maybe if you have 10 great ideas that you want to pursue and you can't decide which one to start with. you can put them in a list and then get a random number from 1 to 10 and do that one. any computer can do this

9.29.24  11:01 am   i have this problem where i'm afraid to be misunderstood so i'm being way more verbose than my peers when i try to communicate something. i usually end up being much less concise. how can i be less afraid, or more concise, or both?

      spend some time working on the things you care about, and once you make some confident progress in what you're doing, then you'll be able to express yourself in the way you think makes sense, without so much paranoia

9.29.24  10:50 am   do you ever find yourself holding your forearms up in front of you like a t-rex

      no

9.29.24  10:06 am   did you know that sometimes when people ask a question their question doesn't reflect what they actually wanted to know

     yes

     and you have to answer by inferring from the context what it is they wanted to know

      you don't HAVE to do that, but that is one of the ways to approach it

9.29.24  9:49 am   What animal is most likely to actually come from outer space?

      bugs

9.29.24  8:32 am   how important is it to clean your room?

      it's almost as important as having a room

9.29.24  4:38 am   I can't count all the stars in the sky because I keep losing track. 

      you probably don't even have access to some of them

9.29.24  3:00 am   would you ever make an album? i'm only asking because each of your songs seem so different to each other and each of them have their own vibe/meaning yet they're all so you. and i mean hey you did make that one song for your next album, so is it ever coming? and would it be just sort of a whole bunch of different songs or would they all have some similarities? or maybe even a concept/story album? idk pls make more music please

      albums don't seem necessary, but i will make much much more music

9.29.24  1:46 am   if a hen and a half can lay an egg and a half in a day and a half, how many eggs can 1 rooster lay in 1 day?

      usually none

9.29.24  1:16 am   Do you escape or snap out of reality often? If so, how often and why? 

      i can't think of anything that's not at least tangential to reality. so i can't really argue that it's even possible to escape it

9.29.24  1:09 am   What do you think about when you write your music?

      feel, not think. if you start thinking then everything tenses up and goes nowhere

9.29.24  1:03 am   I really want to express myself 

      that can be arranged

9.29.24  12:55 am   How do I count large numbers of things?

      how are they organized

9.29.24  12:45 am   what do you think about game development? 

      sounds like fun

9.29.24  12:08 am   what do you think of oreos

      i respect them less, now that i know that hydrox was actually FIRST !! ??

9.28.24  11:28 pm   Have you heard of attachment theory?

     if that's supposed to be 1 specific theory, then i kinda feel like it needs a more specific name (Joe Attachman's theory of attachment, etc). anyone can theorize about attachment, heck i've done it. and what is being attached anyway? any item? chemicals? story fragments? none of that is evident from the title either

     What's your attachment style?

     sometimes i try to just lay everything out and then there's an intuitive sense of which things belong together. but it could go so many different ways

9.28.24  9:42 pm   you gonna make biscuits?

      i don't know

9.28.24  8:36 pm   what are some good alternates to adobe animate? i really want to start animating but i dont have enough money

      a great alternative is to invent your own way. especially nowadays

9.28.24  8:17 pm   people seem to hate 88 key keyboards because of the weight.

     i've actually never heard anyone else complain about that except me. most other people seem to highly respect them

      how would you feel about an unweighted 88 key keyboard?

     never seen one. for me that would still be a larger item than i would want in my studio, or to transport

      thats what i have right now and apparently thats crazy. would you have a preference for 61 or 88 if both were unweighted? im trying to figure out which to buy (i want a 2nd keyboard im not replacing this one)

     what i would want has nothing to do with what you should get, unless you are getting it for me

9.28.24  7:53 pm   i like your music. what's your brain like when making it

      extremely normal

9.28.24  7:36 pm   if the ground plane were a real thing, how would it be distinct from a train

      the name

9.28.24  7:34 pm   is tape measure scary for you?

      no

9.28.24  7:23 pm   what does it mean in the part of "got some money" where the 7 turns into an 8

      the line seems to be "that's when i knew that the fairy tale was true." what would you have done there?

9.28.24  7:09 pm   will anything important ever happen anymore?

      yes

9.28.24  6:11 pm   i am feeling overwhelmed with information. is it time to make a spreadsheet?

      sure

9.28.24  6:08 pm   What was before the Big Bang?

      no it wasn't

9.28.24  5:21 pm   i have an extra guitar case and its taking up space in my room idk what to do with it. its just the case theres no guitar

      according to my calculations, you should either sell 1 case or buy 1 guitar

9.28.24  4:39 pm   i am so bad and horrible actually. i think things are gonna be pretty bad for me moving forward

      we'll see about that

9.28.24  4:01 pm   do you think there is anything intrinsic to your soul or do you think we are all just a combination of genetics and socialization? If a different soul was injected into the embryo in your mother, would the baby come out as the exact same as yourself?

      i'm not sure. the terminology you used seems too vague to pin down. also you started with an A-or-B scenario which didn't seem so obviously mutually exclusive. also there was something circular about the logic, because it seemed like in order to answer the question i'd have to define the word 'soul', but i'd also have to do that in order to understand the question in the first place

9.28.24  2:08 pm   If the song Money by Pink Floyd didn't have the sound of a cash register at the beginning, would the song be better or worse?

      it just would have been less expensive

9.28.24  2:00 pm   What do you think

      "hmm..."

9.28.24  1:42 pm   Favorite type of tree?

      huge

9.28.24  1:12 pm   is there a reason for reason?

      you

9.28.24  11:47 am   what is the square root of 120000 

      maybe around 345

9.28.24  11:38 am   Should I release my music or not? (I think I know what you'll say, but just asking) 

      you should probably at least give it a chance to be heard by someone somewhere somehow for some reason

9.28.24  10:25 am   why is the world so dumb and stupid

      due to intelligence

9.28.24  10:03 am   why did the chicken cross the road

      to disprove the previous explanation

9.28.24  9:44 am   what if you change the world, but don't like how it turns out.. can you change it again?

      yes
